column2: Extra-EU28 trade of mineral fuels, lubricants and related materials (SITC 3), by main partners

column1: General Disclaimer of the EC website:

column2: The table shows the 10 main partners of the EU28 for that product group (according to the sum imports+exports). Imports are expressed in value terms and measured cif (cost, insurance, freight). Exports are expressed in value terms and measured fob (free on board). Balance = export - import.
